title: my split stolen and sold on ebay last week need info asap!!

posts.content:
morning all my split was taken out of my unit last week and sold on ebay for around Â£4000 it is a 66 portugese import still in resto process,mostly in white high build primer its an 11 window converted panel van as per portugese spec its on dropped spindles and straight axled at the back,it wouldnt of had any glass or bumpers with it and was on scabby wheels while being restoredsome doors where in grey primer some still covered in rust rear battery tray area had no paint on the rear quarter right hand side it was advertised and sold on ebay as having no documents that is coz its my van i have all the documents,vin plates keys etc.etc. iam trying to get the item number it was sold on ebay with so ebay can contact the person who brought it as its now registered as stolen along with my 66 lambretta li 150 special and a massive amount of tools
,original devon interior etc etc PLEASE PLEASE HELP if you can in any way much appreciated dave

Is it this one

http://www.ebay.co.uk/itm/VW-Split-Scre ... 46047567fd

It is a trade seller with the address at the bottom. Wouldn't be the first stolen bus to turn up on a scabby industrial in Essex

Oh and in case it disappears, the ebay seller was selling on behalf of someone else

Any questions please contact Darryl on 07864112267

But unfortunately the person who won the auction has already picked it up as the ebay seller has left him feedback

http://feedback.ebay.co.uk/ws/eBayISAPI ... llFeedback

The buyer (who has never sold anything or bought anything before) but the police would be able to get Ebay to hand over the details

http://myworld.ebay.co.uk/sellwood1-uk

May not be these people so don't think i'm slagging them off *diclaimer*

Rhona Harper
Unit 6d Chase Farm Units
Vicarage Lane
North Weald
Essex
CM16 6AL
United Kingdom


Darryl on 07864112267


Just in case it completely disappears off flea bay
thats the one thanks so much chaps im onto the police and ebay now
Good luck. The power of forums...

Are some people just bloody thick or completely brazen?

Selling a split that's stolen on eBay where all split owners look if something is stolen?

Be interesting to hear the outcome!

Contact the police and get them to trace the number plates in the photo
the mini in the garage D588 GWD
KIA IN FRONT OF THE VAN TO THE RIGHT KU04JZT
FIAT M706FGF
ONE OF THESE CARS MAY BELONG TO THE THEAVING SCUM

I can't believe some people !

at least your on the right track Dave, best of luck in getting your van back, keep us informed.

Jason

best of luck with getting your bus back mate.

i have a few contacts that way, traders and customers etc so will have a ring about tomorrow and see if anyone knows of a van thats just been bought etc.

nathan
Keep us posted would be great to get a positive outcome
It beggars belief! Keep going till you get somewhere! Good luck.

I suspect the 'buyer' is just a front to fence the van.

Note the email of the 'seller' is rhona-13@hotmail.co.uk

Won't want to email our opinions of the thieving scum to that address would we?

If the police aren't interested then a few baseball bats might come in handy in Essex
I really want to hear a good outcome to this...

I was thinking,

isn't the seller guilty of handling stolen goods ? even if he didn't know it. you can prove to the police the van is yours so then the presure would be on the seller to give the "friend" up or be found guilty.

or is that to much like justice for that to work

Jason
